title: Chaoji Fangchengshi
synopsis: In 2015, Formula-X was launched [1] and immediately became one of the most popular motorsports in the world. "Tyler Haze" team (Tyler Haze)-coached by the former Formula One driver Hans (Hans), backed by the world's richest sponsors and top technology support team, not only for two consecutive sessions Continuing to win the Formula Super World Championship, and the top spot in the new Formula Super Championship has long been regarded as something in the bag. Various data indicate that the dominance of the "Taylor Black Lions" team in the super formula car scene seems unshakable... At the same time, former World Formula One champion Sam (Sam), a legendary racing driver in the car industry at the time, led the young team "Fenix ​​Racing" once again as a coach. The car industry is determined to hit the new Super Formula Championship championship; but when the championship comes, the Flygt team is facing various crises such as driver defection, lack of funds and technological resources; at this critical moment of the team’s life and death, Sen accidentally discovered the team’s ownership Trainee maintenance man-Guang is very talented as a racer, and Sen believes that in the race, the ability of the driver always surpasses the technology, which is the key to determining the outcome. So he decided to train Hwang and let Hwang participate in the race as a flying driver. This combination of legendary coaches and genius drivers who love racing but have never set foot on the track, although facing the test of serious problems such as lack of practical experience and shortage of scientific and technological resources, still insists on the goal of the world championship and faces the challenge" "Taylor Black Lion" team dominates the car world. They came to the stadium with their dedication and passion for motorsports, determined to realize this unstoppable dream on this track. In this fierce competition, can extraordinary talents make up for lack of experience? Can teamwork beat high-end technology? In the end, which team will stand out and stand out from the crowd? Beginning with the 5th Super Formula Competition, all answers will be announced by Aguang, Asen and other flying crews one by one!(translated from baidu baike)
